Tabs

 Tab configuration rules The new title you want to display. URL for the new favicon.

Pinned

To pin the tab, otherwise nothing happens.

Protected

Will ask you before closing the tab.

Unique

Will prevent for opening a new tab if it is already opened.
 Regular expression to search string fragment(s) and use it inside the title property. Delete Duplicate Add Save
